introText: Welcome to the MUD of Babel!

Plaza.description:
You are in an expansive plaza surrounded by 10 buildings conforming General Works.
The buildings are accessible via their classification code, visible above the main door: [A_AC] “Collections.  Series.  Collected works Building”, [A_AE] “Encyclopedias Building”, [A_AG] “Dictionaries and other general reference works Building”, [A_AZ] “History of scholarship and learning.  The humanities Building”, [A_AM] “Museums.  Collectors and collecting Building”, [A_AS] “Academies and learned societies Building”, [A_AP] “Periodicals Building”, [A_AY] “Yearbooks.  Almanacs.  Directories Building”, [A_AI] “Indexes Building”, [A_AN] “Newspapers Building”.

A_AC.description: There are 2 rooms throughout this building. Visit them with the appropriate code. [A_AC_AC1-195] “Collections of monographs, essays, etc. Room”, [A_AC_AC1-999] “Collections.  Series.  Collected works Room”.

A_AC_AC1-195.description: Description for “Collections of monographs, essays, etc. Room”. You can exit to the building lobby.

A_AC_AC1-999.description: Description for “Collections.  Series.  Collected works Room”. You can exit to the building lobby.

A_AE.description: There is 1 room throughout this building. Visit it with the appropriate code. [A_AE_AE1-90] “Encyclopedias Room”.

A_AE_AE1-90.description: Description for “Encyclopedias Room”. You can exit to the building lobby.

A_AG.displayName: Dictionaries and other general reference works
A_AG.description: There is 1 room throughout this building. Visit it with the appropriate code. [A_AG_AG2-600] “Dictionaries and other general reference works Room”.

A_AZ_AZ20-999.description: Description for “History of scholarship and learning.  The humanities Room”. You can exit to the building lobby.
